name: Personal Website
description: A personal portfolio built with Reflex and deployed on Azure Container Apps.

name: Finmail (Azure Function)
description: Finmail is a financial email processing system built with Azure Functions. It processes transactional emails (from various of my bank accounts), extracts the relevant financial data, and uploads it to a Google Sheet.
